mcq.statement: Which statement about chromosome is correct? Genes include long DNA molecules called chromosomes, Chromosomes are long DNA molecules called genes which are divided into sections, Chromosomes include a long molecule of DNA divided into sections called genes, Chromosomes include genes which are divided into sections called DNA molecules

options.a: Genes include long DNA molecules called chromosomes
options.b: Chromosomes are long DNA molecules called genes which are divided into sections
options.c: Chromosomes include a long molecule of DNA divided into sections called genes
options.d: Chromosomes include genes which are divided into sections called DNA molecules
